name: Dodge in Pieces
description:
bitmagine Studio brings you for your enjoyment another game in the "Instant Fun" series.

"Dodge in Pieces" is an infinite game in which you only have one goal: survive!

Dodge the enemies while you collect stars and increase your score.

One last IMPORTANT DETAIL: you do not die on contact with the enemy, but a part of your ship will be destroyed and blown up. Just don't let them hit the CORE of your ship or you will die!

MAIN FEATURES:

  • Casual game and infinite fun guaranteed.
  • Pixel-Art style minimalist graphics.
  • Simple one-hand control.
  • Retro effect that you can activate or deactivate as you like.
  • 12 levels of progressive difficulty.
  • Automatic high score saving.
  • Music by the great composer Alexandr Zhelanov.
